DOC.brief_summary: Patients prostate cancer follow examination include biopsy , serum PSA volume , prostate CT scan MRI , bone scan , abdomen ultrasound , chest X ray , blood biochemistry , blood rout , ECG testosterone . Two group : First group:30 case treat iodine 125 seed implant 0.5 mc transperineal prostate implant +Zoladex 3.6mg im 1/28d ( LHRH agonist , 3.6mg subcutaneous injection 1/4weeks ) . Second group : 30 case treat Zoladex 3.6mg im 1/28d ( LHRH agonist , 3.6mg subcutaneous injection 1/4weeks ) . PFS PSA level primary variable .
DOC.brief_title: Combination Iodine 125 Seed Implants LHRH Agonists Locally Advanced ( Stage T3 ) Prostate Cancer
